CustomField.formula:
IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Channel",
IMAGE('/resource/LogoChannel/LogoChannel/' + BU_Code__c +'.png', '' , 45, 90),
IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Country",
IMAGE('/resource/LogoCountry/LogoCountry/' + BU_Code__c +'.png', '' , 45, 90),
IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Assortment_Cluster",
IMAGE('/resource/LogoCluster/LogoCluster/' + BU_Code__c +'.png', '' , 45, 90),
IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Wharehouse",
IMAGE('/resource/LogoWharehouse/LogoWharehouse/' + BU_Code__c +'.png', '' , 45, 90),
IF ( RecordType.DeveloperName ="Banner",
IMAGE('/resource/LogoBU/LogoBU/' + BU_Code__c +'.png', '' , 45, 90), NULL)))))
CustomField.label: SPKERCADELAC Logo
